info.title: Fantasy Premier League
info.description: Fantasy Premier League stats, events and league information

get.description: This action allows you to return information on a Classic League in Fantasy Premier League with a league ID
This endpoint returns a manager’s data from previous Gameweeks (current), previous seasons (past), and chips that already used during this season. You need to provide the Manager ID.
This returns the managers (user's) basic information such as leagues joined, favorite team, first and last names
This endpoint returns a list of players’ information in that specific Gameweek.
This endpoint returns a player’s detailed information divided into 3 sections; fixtures, current league history and previous years history
This endpoint returns a JSON array which contains every fixture of the season.
This endpoint returns general information about the Fantasy Premier League
